snippet: Roger Federer advanced to the Rogers Cup final Saturday night after beating Spain’s Feliciano López, 6-3, 6-4, to set up a match against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga.
abstract: Roger Federer defeats Feliciano Lopez and Jo-Wilfried Tsonga beats Grigor Dimitrov to advance to Roger Cup tennis tournament men's final.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer advanced to the Rogers Cup final Saturday night after beating Spain’s Feliciano López, 6-3, 6-4, to set up a match against Jo-Wilfried Tsonga.

headline.main: Tsonga Will Play in Final at Rogers Cup
headline.print_headline: Federer to Face Tsonga in Final at Rogers Cup
